messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

On 2013/04/23 20:30:23, bradfitz wrote:
> Hello mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
> 
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

iant suggests for this CL to be merged with CL 8663052.

On Wed, Apr 24, 2013 at 7:45 AM, <0xE2.0x9A.0x9B@gmail.com> wrote:

> On 2013/04/23 20:30:23, bradfitz wrote:
>
>> Hello mailto:golang-dev@**googlegroups.com <golang-dev@googlegroups.com>,
>>
>
>  I'd like you to review this change to
>> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
>>
>
> iant suggests for this CL to be merged with CL 8663052.
>
> https://codereview.appspot.**com/8607045/<https://codereview.appspot.com/8607045/>


Go for it.  I didn't write this repro, anyway.  I just converted the zip
file in the issue tracker to the test/fixedbugs format.  The original
author is in CONTRIBUTORS.

subject: code review 8607045: Failing tests for Issue 5291
